mapper.select: SELECT num, user_id, writer, content, ref_group, comment_group, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regdate FROM tp_priboard_comment WHERE ref_group=#{num} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_priboard_comment (num, user_id, writer, content, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{user_id}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
